short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Enjoy Basketball Legends Unblocked right from your Chrome extension - Give it a shot now!
short.ca: Profitez de Basketball Legends Unblocked directement depuis votre extension Chrome - Essayez dès maintenant !
short.el,id: Disfruta de Basketball Legends Desbloqueado directamente desde tu extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Disfruta de Basketball Legends desbloqueado directamente desde tu extensión de Chrome. ¡Inténtalo ahora!
short.et: Nautige korvpalli legendide blokeerimatut otseteed otse oma Chrome'i laiendusest - proovige kohe!
short.fi: Nauti Basketball Legends Unblocked suoraan Chrome-laajennuksestasi - Kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Mag-enjoy ng Basketball Legends Unblocked mula mismo sa iyong Chrome extension - Subukan mo na ngayon!
short.he: תהנה ממשחק Basketball Legends Unblocked ישירות מההרחבה שלך ב-Chrome - תנסה עכשיו!
short.hi: Disfruta de Basketball Legends desbloqueado directamente desde tu extensión de Chrome: ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Próbálja ki most a Basketball Legends Unblocked játékot közvetlenül a Chrome bővítményéből - Élvezze!
short.it: Goditi Basketball Legends Sbloccato direttamente dalla tua estensione Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ja: 今すぐChrome拡張機能からBasketball Legends Unblockedをお楽しみください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램을 통해 바로 블록되지 않은 농구 전설을 즐기세요. 지금 시도해보세요!
short.lv: Izbaudi Basketbola Lieldarbus Atbloķēti tieši no savas "Chrome" paplašināšanas - Izmet to tagad!
short.ms: Disfruta de Basketball Legends desbloqueado directamente desde tu extensión de Chrome. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.nl: Geniet van Basketball Legends Unblocked rechtstreeks vanuit je Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu uit!
short.no: ¡Disfruta de Basketball Legends Desbloqueado directamente desde tu extensión de Chrome - Pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Korzystaj z gry Basketball Legends Unblocked bezpośrednio z rozszerzenia Chrome - Spróbuj już teraz!
short.ro: Bucurați-vă de Basketball Legends Deblocat direct din extensia Chrome - Încercați acum!
short.ru: Наслаждайтесь игрой в "Баскетбольные Легенды" без блокировки прямо из своего расширения для Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Užite si Basketball Legends Unblocked priamo z vášho rozšírenia Chrome - Vyskúšajte to teraz!
short.sl: Uživajte v odprtokodnem košarkarskem turnirju Basketball Legends neposredno iz svoje razširitve Chrome - poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Уживајте у Баскетбалским легендама Блокираним право из вашег Чромовог проширења - Покушајте сада!
short.sv: Njut av Basketball Legends Unblocked direkt från din Chrome-tillägg - Ge det en chans nu!
short.th: สนุกกับการเล่นเกม Basketball Legends ได้ทันทีจากส่วนเสริมของ Google Chrome ของคุณ - ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้เลย!
short.vi: Hãy thưởng thức trò chơi Basketball Legends Unblocked ngay từ tiện ích Chrome của bạn - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 立即从您的Chrome扩展程序中享受篮球传奇解锁游戏-现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 請從您的 Chrome 擴充功能盡情享受未封鎖的籃球傳奇 - 立即嘗試吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to hit the court with Basketball Legends Unblocked! Lace up your virtual sneakers and choose to play as legendary basketball stars or create your own custom player. Showcase your skills with gravity-defying dunks and incredible moves in this fast-paced sports game.

Features:

Play as iconic basketball legends or create custom characters 🌟
Engage in quick 2v2 matches or intense 1v1 showdowns ⚡
Unlock special moves and power-ups to dominate the game 💥
Multiple game modes: Tournament, Practice, and more 🏆
Enjoy vibrant, cartoon-style graphics that bring the action to life 🎨
Perfect your jump shot, master alley-oops, and rise to the top as a true Basketball Legend! Challenge your friends or take on AI opponents in this addictive sports game. 🤖👥

Don’t forget to explore more exciting games in the top-left menu! 🎮
